Directions: Unroll pizza dough and place in a greased 15-in. x 10-in. x 1-in. baking pan; flatten dough and build up edges slightly. Prick dough several times with a fork. Bake at 425 degrees F for 10-11 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool on a wire rack.

Meanwhile, in a bowl, combine the sour cream, mayonnaise, cilantro, jalapeno, sugar, chili powder, salt and cumin. Spread over cooled crust. Toss avocado with lime juice; arrange over sour cream mixture. Sprinkle with tomatoes, onions, olives and cheese.  Refrigerate until serving. Cut into squares.
Ingredients: 2 tablespoons minced fresh cilantro or parsley
1 medium ripe avocado, peeled and cubed
1 cup shredded Mexican blend cheese or Cheddar cheese
